mapper.select: select r.id, r.message, r.at_created_time, r.at_updated_time from reply r where r.is_deleted = false
select r.id, r.message, r.at_created_time, r.at_updated_time from reply r where r.is_deleted = false and r.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reply(message, member, board, at_created_time, at_updated_time) values (#{message}, #{member.id} ,#{board.id} ,now(), now())
mapper.delete: delete from reply r where r.id = #{id}
